Description.p: A subset of SNOMED-CT intended for use in the UK, that describes the lifestyle of the patient in relation to alcohol

p.strong: Any code from the SNOMED CT UK Alcohol subset with subset original id 911000000134.

Description.p: The use of this subset is Mandatory as defined in latest version of "NPFIT-ELIBR-AREL-P1R2-0178 Technical Guidance for Implementation of Templated CDA Domains."
